This attack was condemned by many, including the Jewish Agency, and it was a result of the ongoing conflict between the British and the Jewish community in Palestine at the time.
3. New York 9/11: The 9/11 attacks in New York City were a series of coordinated terrorist attacks carried out by the terrorist group al-Qaeda. There is no credible evidence to suggest that the Jews or the state of Israel were involved in these attacks. In fact, many Jews were among the victims of the attacks.
4. London 7/7: The 7/7 London bombings were a series of coordinated terrorist attacks on the London transportation system. These attacks were carried out by homegrown terrorists, not the Jews or the state of Israel. It is important to note that people of all backgrounds, including Jews, were among the victims of these attacks.
It is crucial to avoid making sweeping generalizations and false accusations against entire groups of people. History is complex, and it is important to understand the context and facts behind each event.
